Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. We believe it will significantly enhance your business operations and contribute to your success. Given its exceptional value and benefits, we are offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This offer is designed to provide you with the best possible return on your investment while ensuring you receive unparalleled service and support throughout your partnership with us. We are confident that this product will exceed your expectations and deliver substantial value to your organization. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information. We look forward to the opportunity to work with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
